citation: Road Safety (Alcohol and Drugs) (Approval of Instruments) Notice 2010 (Tas)
text:
Road Safety (Alcohol and Drugs) (Approval of Instruments) Notice 2010

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following notice under section 2(1) of the Road Safety (Alcohol and Drugs) Act 1970 .

25 October 2010

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

L. E. THORP

Minister for Police and Emergency Management

1. Short title
    This notice may be cited as the Road Safety (Alcohol and Drugs) (Approval of Instruments) Notice 2010 .

2. Commencement
    This notice takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Approval of breath testing device
    The device specified in Schedule 1 to this notice is approved for use in the carrying out of breath tests under the Road Safety (Alcohol and Drugs) Act 1970 .

SCHEDULE 1 - Device Approved for Use in the Carrying Out of Breath Tests

Clause 3

    1. The device under the brand name of "ENVITEC" which bears on its body the name "ENVITEC ALCOQUANT".

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 3 November 2010

This notice is administered in the Department of Police and Emergency Management.
